posts.post_content:
N300 McCarthy SGC 1.5
SOLD

Always open to offers.  

List price includes shipping and insurance.

"I'll take it" takes precedent over all ongoing negotiations.

I am unable to accept Paypal. Payment can be made by check or money order and I can also accept electronic payment through Venmo or Zelle.
